title: GM’s Dream Cars Gone in Flames, Including the 2026 Camaro?
description: A massive fire has torn through GM’s Advanced Design Center in California, potentially reducing some of the company’s most confidential designs to ashes. The facility is where the brand’s dreams take shape, standing as GM’s playground for next-generation concepts and design studies. Early reports ...
titleSummary: "Fiat Fiery Fate: High-Tech Concepts Incinerated, Leaving 2026 Camaro's Future Ashes"
descriptionSummary: A catastrophic blaze swept through General Motors' elite design studio in California, threatening to incinerate sensitive blueprints for the automaker's most innovative future projects. This hub of creative genius was where groundbreaking ideas came to life.

title: Kia Already Planning to Redesign its First Pickup Truck
description: When Kia launched the Tasman, it became the Korean brand's first real attempt at building a truck designed for personal and recreational use, not just a small commercial vehicle—a real headline-maker that grabbed attention worldwide. However, its polarizing design also kept people talking. The ...
titleSummary: Kia's Early Success with its First Pickup Trunk Sparks Revamp Plans
descriptionSummary: Kia's Tasman marked a significant shift in the brand's truck strategy, transitioning from utilitarian workhorses to rugged vehicles designed for personal adventures and leisurely pursuits, sparking global interest with its bold, eye-catching aesthetic.

title: GM to Drop Apple CarPlay and Android Auto from All Vehicles
description: General Motors has confirmed it plans to remove Apple CarPlay and Android Auto from all future vehicles, expanding a controversial decision that previously applied only to its EV lineup. In an interview with The Verge, CEO Mary Barra said the move will eventually cover the company’s entire ...
titleSummary: GM Ditches Smartphone Integration in Future Models, Starting Next Year
descriptionSummary: General Motors is set to drop Apple CarPlay and Android Auto integration from all new vehicles, building on a previous decision that initially targeted its electric vehicle lineup, according to comments made by CEO Mary Barra.

title: Toyota RAV4 PHEV’s Fast Charging Limited To Two Trims—Here’s Why
description: We just had the opportunity to get the wheel of the all-new 2026 Toyota RAV4, which is particularly quick in plug-in hybrid form. This 324-horsepower PHEV is more powerful than any direct rival, but this electrified crossover also has the ability to make use of a Level 3 fast charger for its ...
titleSummary: "RAV4 Plug-in Hybrids' Rapid Charging Capabilities Hinge on Trim Level"
descriptionSummary: We took the wheel of the all-new Toyota RAV4, with its plug-in hybrid variant boasting impressive acceleration - a whopping 324 horsepower, outpacing its competitors. But what's just as exciting is its compatibility with high-speed charging technology.

title: Manual-Swapped 2006 Lamborghini Murciélago Roadster For Sale With 19,900 Miles
description: The Murciélago was never meant to be tame. Named after a legendary fighting bull that survived 24 sword strokes, this Lamborghini embodies defiance. Its naturally aspirated 6.2-liter V12 screams with a fury that modern turbocharged engines just can’t replicate. Add a gated six-speed manual and ...
titleSummary: Rare Exotic: '06 Lamborghini Murciélago Roadster Trades Hands with Low Mileage"
descriptionSummary: Meet the Murciélago, a Lamborghini born from rebellion. Inspired by an unyielding bull, this beast of a car unleashes a raw, 6.2-liter V12 roar that echoes through the ages. A manual transmission only adds to its untamed spirit.

title: Volkswagen Halts Golf Production Amid Chip Shortage
description: The semiconductor shortage turmoil has again threatened to disrupt the automotive sector, as Volkswagen has already warned its employees of production disruptions at major plants. The reason for this recent chip crisis is due to recent geopolitical tensions between the Netherlands and China over ...
titleSummary: "Volkswagen Brings Golf Factory to Standstill Over Global Semiconductor Crunch"
descriptionSummary: A fresh wave of semiconductor shortages is looming, potentially crippling the auto industry. Volkswagen has alerted staff that key production sites may be affected as a result of escalating tensions between China and the Netherlands.

title: Soaring Tariffs Are About to Hit Car Buyers Hard
description: The third quarter was rough for General Motors, and likely won’t look much better for the rest of the industry, analysts warn. The biggest of the Detroit automakers saw earnings fall by half, partially the result of a shifting strategy on EVs, but also due to the cost of tariffs. Collectively, ...
titleSummary: "New Trade Barriers Threaten to Slam Brakes on US Auto Sales"
descriptionSummary: General Motors struggled in Q3, and experts predict a similar challenging outlook for the rest of the industry. Earnings plunged 50% for the Detroit giant, driven by a pivot towards electric vehicles and rising tariff costs.

title: We Love Japan's Punishment for Hit-and-Run Drivers
description: Imagine stepping out for a short errand and returning to your car only to see a big, glaring dent. Ah, the classic hit-and-run. An insurance claim for the repair would help, sure, but the fact remains: someone broke the law and left. No note, no witnesses. In Japan, the offender wouldn't be getting ...
titleSummary: "Tough Justice in Tokyo: Japan Gets Tough on Reckless Road Users"
descriptionSummary: A routine errand turns into a frustrating discovery when you return to find your car sporting a mysterious dent. The culprit is likely long gone, leaving behind only damage and unanswered questions about their intentions.

title: Three Classic Bentley Sedans Reborn as Bespoke Flying Spurs
description: The Bentley Bentayga SUV may be the British automaker’s best-selling current model, but there’s still something especially dignified about pulling up to your destination in a classic Bentley sedan. To honor three of the most influential sedans throughout its history, Bentley has created three ...
titleSummary: "Reimagined Luxury: Three Iconic Bentleys Transformed into Exclusive Flying Spur Masterpieces"
descriptionSummary: For those seeking refined luxury, a classic Bentley sedan is hard to beat, evoking timeless elegance and sophistication wherever it goes. In tribute, Bentley's latest celebration showcases three iconic sedans that have shaped the brand's heritage.

title: Teardown Reveals Why Toyota’s Legendary 1FZ-FE Engine Lasts Forever
description: The 80-series Toyota Land Cruiser is known for its robust off-roading capability and its 1FZ-FE inline-six engine. Introduced in the early 1990s, the 4.5-liter, 24-valve DOHC power plant replaced the older F-series straight-six, bringing smoother operation and better power delivery to the SUV, but ...
titleSummary: "Unpacking the Secret to Toyota's Enduring 1FZ-FE Powerhouse"
descriptionSummary: The 80-series Toyota Land Cruiser boasts impressive off-road prowess, thanks in part to its potent 1FZ-FE inline-six engine. This stalwart powerplant, introduced in the early 1990s, set a new standard for performance and refinement in the rugged SUV.

title: Jeep’s New Recon EV Launches This Spring — But the CEO Admits It May Struggle to Find Buyers
description: The Jeep Recon has been one of the most anticipated cars on our radar for some time now. Between its appealingly boxy looks and the fact that it’ll be priced below the only other electric Jeep (the Wagoneer S), the Recon is one to watch out for. It will also become one of the few truly rugged ...
titleSummary: "Jeep's Electric Off-Roader Hits Shores in Spring, but Sales Hopes Are Rocked by Uncertainty"
descriptionSummary: The highly anticipated Jeep Recon has generated significant buzz, thanks in part to its distinctive design and competitive pricing, which makes it an attractive option compared to other EV offerings from the brand.

title: “An All-Electric Corvette That Feels Like a Corvette Is Not Easy Right Now,” Says GM President
description: GM doesn't show a lot of restraint in electrifying its vehicles. The Escalade has an electric alternative in the form of the Escalade IQ. So do many of the brand's popular SUV and crossover models. These aars, you could argue, are essential for reducing tailpipe emissions, and that's important in a ...
titleSummary: "GM's E-Vette Dilemma: Balancing Performance with Zero Emissions Proves a High-Stakes Challenge"
descriptionSummary: GM is rapidly expanding its electrified lineup with plug-in options available across several popular SUVs and crossovers, including the Escalade IQ. This shift aims to significantly reduce carbon footprint and emissions.

title: Nissan's Newest EV Doesn't Need Charging – Will It Reach Production?
description: With the advent of EVs, the idea of running partly on solar power has been around for decades. There have been prototypes, concept cars, and even a few small-scale projects, but no major automaker has ever fully committed to putting one into production. There have been many challenges, but that ...
titleSummary: "Game-Changing Nissan Electric Car Powers On for Days Without Recharge, But Is It Headed to Dealerships?"
descriptionSummary: Electric vehicles have long sparked interest in harnessing solar energy on the go. While early concepts and test runs existed, mass-market implementation has remained elusive due to numerous technological hurdles.

title: European Cities Warn That Accepting US Car Standards Will Risk European Lives
description: In a recently published letter addressed to European Union officials, dated October 20, public officials from prominent European cities such as Paris, Brussels and Amsterdam, as well as more than 75 civil society organizations in the region, have warned that the EU must revisit what it calls a ...
titleSummary: EU Leaders Fear Adopting US Auto Rules May Imperil Road Safety Across Continent
descriptionSummary: A coalition of government representatives from major European cities and over 75 regional non-profits has sounded the alarm to EU officials, urging them to re-examine key policies affecting the continent's future.

title: Free EV Charging at Home? Volvo’s Big New Perk Starts in Sweden
description: Volvo Cars is giving Swedish buyers of its fully electric models a reason to plug in at home. Beginning February 2026, the automaker will offer one year of free home charging through a partnership with energy supplier Vattenfall. The program grants customers up to 5,150 ...
titleSummary: "Volvo Unveils Revolutionary In-Home Electric Vehicle Charging Initiative for Swedish Customers"
descriptionSummary: Volvo is launching a new initiative for Swedish buyers of its electric vehicles, providing one year of complimentary home charging through a collaboration with energy provider Vattenfall, starting in February 2026.

title: VW Pauses ID. Buzz Production Amid Weak Sales and $60K Price Tag
description: Volkswagen’s retro-inspired ID. Buzz set out to revive the spirit of the Microbus for the electric age. It’s stylish, practical, and packed with personality. But one year after launch, the excitement has cooled. The automaker has paused production of the ID. Buzz at its Hanover, Germany, plant ...
titleSummary: Volkswagen Halts ID. Buzz Output Due to Soft Demand and Premium Pricing
descriptionSummary: Volkswagen's nostalgic ID. Buzz aimed to breathe new life into the iconic Microbus for the electric era, blending style and practicality with a dash of personality. However, nearly 12 months after its debut, enthusiasm has begun to wane. Production of the ID. Buzz has been temporarily halted at Volkswagen's Hanover facility in Germany.

title: Porsche Working on Radical New W18 Engine With Three Banks of Cylinders
description: Just a few days after we reported on Porsche’s patent detailing the application of electrically-assisted twin turbos to combat flow stall, the German Patent and Trade Mark Office (DPMA) has disclosed another Porsche patent, this time describing a unique W18 motor. Filed in April of 2024 and only ...
titleSummary: "Revolutionary Road: Porsche Unveils Groundbreaking 18-Cylinder Engine with Triple Power Sources"
descriptionSummary: Porsche has filed a new patent with the DPMA, revealing a cutting-edge W18 engine design. This innovative motor is the latest in a string of patents from the German automaker, showcasing its commitment to pushing automotive boundaries.

title: GM Doesn't Want You To Drive Its Cars - Eyes-Off Driving and a New AI Assistant Are Coming Soon
description: At a media event in New York, GM announced a new "eyes-off" driving feature and a new conversational AI assistant for its vehicles. It will be, according to the company's press release, "a new era of transportation." General Motors wants you to text your pals, call an ex, or talk to an AI assistant ...
titleSummary: "GM's Next Move: Hands-Free Driving and an Intelligent Co-Pilot on the Horizon"
descriptionSummary: General Motors unveiled innovative in-car technologies at a recent New York media event, including a hands-free driving feature and a conversational AI companion designed to redefine the future of transportation.

title: Kia Made a Gasoline-Scented Air Freshener for EV Drivers Missing the Smell of Fuel
description: Kia has unveiled one of the strangest yet most entertaining EV accessories of the year, a gasoline-scented air freshener aimed at electric vehicle drivers who miss the smell of traditional motoring. The limited-edition item, shaped like a miniature jerrycan, was launched in Finland alongside the ...
titleSummary: "Kia Captures the Essence of Gas in Innovative Air Freshener for Electric Vehicle Owners"
descriptionSummary: Kia has introduced an unconventional accessory for electric vehicle owners, a nostalgic air freshener mimicking the scent of gasoline to evoke the familiar aroma of traditional driving.

title: The Fastest Electric Hypercar at the Nürburgring Can’t Beat Ford’s Mustang GTD
description: Another day, yet another record. This time, it’s BYD—well, technically, Yangwang, the brand’s luxury division. The car in question is the uber-quick U9 Xtreme, which, although not official, already made headlines as the fastest EV on the planet, clocking 308 mph and snatching the top-speed title ...
titleSummary: "Nürburgring Reigns Supreme: Unlikely Upset as Ford's Pony Overtakes Electric Supercars"
descriptionSummary: Yangwang, BYD's luxury arm, has shattered another record with its ultra-performance model. The U9 Xtreme, unofficially touted as the world's fastest electric vehicle, boasts an astonishing top speed of 308 mph, solidifying its reputation as a high-octane marvel.

title: RECALL: Ford's Own Aftermarket Supercharger Kit Makes The Mustang Unsafe
description: Modifying a Ford Mustang with a supercharger kit certainly improves acceleration, but according to a new recall, it may lead to acceleration when you don't want it. A new recall issued by the National Highway Traffic Safety Administration reveals that the Ford Performance M-6066-M8800 Whipple ...
titleSummary: Ford's DIY Boost Goes Wrong: Recall Issued for Defective Mustang Supercharger Kits
descriptionSummary: A Ford Mustang's performance boost from a supercharger kit comes with a caveat - it can also lead to sudden and unwanted acceleration, prompting a safety recall by the National Highway Traffic Administration.

title: Tesla’s Power Trip Ends in a Recall for 13,000 Cars
description: Just when you thought it couldn’t get any worse for Elon Musk-led Tesla, the company announced a recall for nearly 13,000 vehicles in the United States. The announcement comes after Tesla discovered a battery defect that could completely cut drive power and leave drivers stranded without warning. ...
titleSummary: "Tesla's High-Voltage Worry Spreads to Thousands of Vehicles in Sudden Safety Alert"
descriptionSummary: Tesla has issued a voluntary recall of over 13,000 vehicles in the US, citing a critical battery issue that can unexpectedly disable power to the engine, leaving drivers at risk of being stranded on the road.

title: SPIED: BMW's Incredibly Popular Electric Crossover Gets A Taste Of M Flavor
description: It's been a little more than a month since BMW unveiled the all-new Neue Klasse-based iX3 crossover, and despite the broader market's apparent aversion to the adoption of EVs, this one is proving so popular that BMW is struggling to meet demand. The Bavarian automaker isn't resting on its laurels, ...
titleSummary: "M Fusion Ignites: BMW's Best-Seller Goes High-Performance with Electric Punch"
descriptionSummary: With over a month since the unveiling of its sleek Neue Klasse-based iX3 crossover, BMW finds itself in an unexpected predicament: overwhelming demand has the company scrambling to keep up, despite the industry's current lukewarm reception to electric vehicles.

title: Turo Launches New Service as Alternative to Traditional Car Ownership
description: It says its newest features are "an affordable, convenient, and low-commitment alternative to traditional car ownership."
titleSummary: "Turo Takes the Wheel with Game-Changing Peer-to-Peer Car Sharing Platform"
descriptionSummary: The company's latest offering presents a budget-friendly and hassle-free way to get around without making long-term commitments associated with owning a vehicle outright.

title: Tesla Confirms “Epic” Roadster Demo for 2025 After Months of Silence
description: Tesla, after much silence, has decided to give a morsel of an update on the long-awaited Roadster, the successor to the brand's original Lotus Elise-based sports car. Originally set for a 2020 release, Tesla says it will host the "most epic demo" showcasing the Roadster before the end of 2025. ...
titleSummary: "Tesla Unveils Highly Anticipated 2025 Roadster Reveal Amid Long-Awaited Hype Cycle"
descriptionSummary: After a prolonged quiet period, Tesla is finally shedding light on its eagerly anticipated new Roadster, a successor to its first sports car model. Expect an electrifying preview event by year's end, marking a significant milestone in the vehicle's development.

title: The Next Lexus LS Isn't The Only 6-Wheeler Toyota Has Ever Built
description: The next Lexus LS won't be a sedan. Instead, it's going to be an electric six-wheeled minivan – far from the nameplate that fronts Japanese luxury. The LS concept, set to appear at the Japan Mobility Show, stands for something entirely different: "Luxury Space" instead of "Luxury Sedan." Akio ...
titleSummary: Toyota's Six-Wheel Secrets Revealed: A Surprise in the Luxury Lineup Ahead
descriptionSummary: Lexus is shaking up its iconic LS brand with a radical new design: an electric, six-wheeled minivan that redefines luxury. Debuting at the Japan Mobility Show, it's all about expansive space and innovative mobility.

title: Rare 1991 GMC Syclone For Sale Is One Of The Coolest Trucks Ever Built
description: Back when compact, two-door pickup trucks were still around in the early 1990s, GMC had the wild idea to create a performance version of its Sonoma. Called the GMC Syclone, the pickup’s combination of small size, incredible turbocharged V6 power, and rarity have turned it into a proper cult ...
titleSummary: "Rare '91 GMC Syclone Hits Market: A Truck That Defines Automotive Cool"
descriptionSummary: In the early '90s, compact pickups were still a thing, and GM took a bold gamble by transforming its diminutive Sonoma into a high-performance beast. The resulting Syclone was a potent, turbocharged sensation that's since become a collector's holy grail.

title: Are Honda Prelude Buyers Really Cancelling After Test Drives?
description: The new Honda Prelude drummed up a lot of attention in its home market of Japan. Some positive, in terms of outselling its production allocation, and some not as much. With the new Prelude's performance figures falling short of some people's expectations, it was only a matter of time before the ...
titleSummary: "Drive and Decide: Mystery Surrounds Cancelled Purchases of Honda's Sporty Sedan"
descriptionSummary: The Honda Prelude's Japanese launch sparked intense interest, with both enthusiastic reception and disappointment. While it outsold initial projections, some fans were left underwhelmed by its performance capabilities, paving the way for future adjustments.

title: Tesla Will Hike Model 3 And Model Y Prices in November - But No One Knows By How Much
description: Tesla's website provides a vague message if you go to look at a Model 3 or a Model Y: "Price Increases in November." The website does not provide other information, and no information was given in the form of a press release. Tesla also does not have a PR department to contact for comment, which ...
titleSummary: "Tesla Sets Stage for Price Jumps on Model 3 and Y in November"
descriptionSummary: Tesla's website now features a straightforward notification for the Model 3 and Model Y: price increases took effect in November. The company hasn't issued a formal announcement or provided additional details about these changes.

title: Toyota Built a Lifted Corolla Cross Hybrid Nobody Asked For
description: The term "soft-roader" wasn't exactly a compliment. Crossovers were often discarded as family vehicles pretending to be rugged. However, the advent of adventure-inspired trims and off-road accessory packages proves that not every trail-worthy vehicle needs to be a full-blown SUV. The Toyota Corolla ...
titleSummary: Toyota Unleashes Unapologetic Off-Road Beast Based on Humble Corolla Hybrid Platform
descriptionSummary: Crossover stigma has faded with the rise of adventure-focused trims and off-road accessories, making it possible for vehicles like the Toyota Corolla to blend comfort and capability in a more nuanced way than traditional SUVs.

title: Infiniti Teases a QX80 Like We've Never Seen Before
description: After nearly two decades in service, the Nissan GT-R R35 has retired, officially ending production and marking the countdown to the next-generation Godzilla. However, Nissan isn't ready to forego Godzilla's legacy just yet. After dressing up the Nissan Z with the GT-R's iconic Midnight Purple, the ...
titleSummary: "Infiniti Unveils a Futuristic QX80 Concept that Redefines Luxury SUV Design"
descriptionSummary: The curtain closes on a two-decade chapter as the Nissan GT-R R35 departs from production lines, paving the way for its successor. But before saying goodbye, Nissan gave a parting gift: wrapping the Nissan Z in the legendary GT-R's signature Midnight Purple hue.

title: The Last Ford F-150 Lightning For Under $50k Is Dead
description: Following the scrapping of the EV tax credit at the end of September, there was some good news for the 2026 Ford F-150 Lightning. Its price will drop by up to $4,000 on certain trims when it becomes available. What was missing from that report was pricing for the Pro, the most affordable trim by ...
titleSummary: "Ford F-150 Lightning Price Hike Cuts Off Last Chance at Affordable Deal"
descriptionSummary: With the federal EV tax credit expiration no longer a factor, the 2026 Ford F-150 Lightning is poised for a price cut of up to $4,000 on select trims when it hits the market. One key detail remains under wraps: pricing for the entry-level Pro model.

title: First Look: All-New 2027 Kia Telluride Teased Ahead of Full Reveal
description: The Telluride is one of Kia’s most important models in the United States. Designed specifically for this market, it has won numerous awards and consistently achieved high sales since going into production in 2019. Now that Hyundai has revealed a new Palisade—which shares a platform with the ...
titleSummary: "Kia Unveils Glimpse of Next-Gen Telluride SUV Before Official Debut Revealed"
descriptionSummary: The Telluride stands out as Kia's flagship model in the US market, boasting impressive sales and critical acclaim since its debut in 2019. Its success sets the stage for comparisons to Hyundai's similarly styled Palisade.

title: Subaru Drops Enticing 2025 Outback Lease Deal For October
description: Subaru revealed a completely new Outback for the 2026 model year back in August, and it’s less wagon and more rugged SUV than before. Unfortunately, the new one also has a much higher price, effectively shutting out Subaru fans who appreciate a no-frills, practical, and high-value package. The good ...
titleSummary: "Outback Owners Can Snag a Sweet Deal on a 2025 Subaru Lease This Fall"
descriptionSummary: Subaru's revamped Outback for 2026 marked a significant departure from its utilitarian roots, embracing a more rugged SUV profile at the expense of value-driven affordability. A hefty price tag now deters enthusiasts seeking a straightforward, no-frills experience.

title: Alfa Romeo Is Desperately Reviving The Quadrifoglio V6 To Keep The Aging Giulia And Stelvio Alive
description: The current-generation (Type 952) Alfa Romeo Giulia was unveiled a decade ago in June 2015, and the Stelvio (Type 949) arrived around the same time, so they're both a little long in the tooth. But according to a new report from Autocar, they'll be soldiering on for another few years until 2027 as ...
titleSummary: "Quadrifoglio's Future on Line as Alfa Works Miracles to Save Struggling Giulia and Stelvio Models"
descriptionSummary: The Alfa Romeo Giulia and its sibling model, the Stelvio, have been stalwarts of the brand's lineup since their introduction nearly a decade ago. However, they're set to continue serving through at least 2027, with updates planned along the way.

title: Nissan Drops Killer 2026 Rogue Lease Deal For October
description: While it can’t match the Toyota RAV4 on the sales charts, the Nissan Rogue is still one of the most popular compact crossovers in the United States. It’s also surprisingly luxurious at the top of the range, challenging Mazda’s classy CX-5 and CX-50 as mainstream crossovers with a dash of premium ...
titleSummary: "Nissan Offers Jaw-Dropping Lease on 2026 Rogue for a Limited Time in October"
descriptionSummary: The Nissan Rogue may trail the Toyota RAV4 in sales figures, but it remains one of America's most sought-after compact SUVs. Its upscale features elevate it to a luxury level, rivaling Mazda's refined CX-5 and CX-50 models.

title: Jaguar's Polarizing EV Looks Like A Fish Out Of Water On The Nürburgring
description: Pretty much everybody has an opinion on Jaguar's recent rebrand and the upcoming Type 00 that spearheads the revolution, and although many of those opinions have been negative, the British automaker is pushing ahead, now taking the car to the Nürburgring to continue development of the powertrain ...
titleSummary: Jaguar's Bold New Electric Car Stumbles on Germany's Iconic Racing Circuit
descriptionSummary: Jaguar is unwavering in its vision for a new era, despite mixed reactions to its rebrand and flagship Type 00 model. The company is taking the vehicle back to the Nürburgring to refine its powerful engine.

title: Tesla Quietly Removes Key Cards From New Cars — and Owners Aren’t Happy
description: When you buy a new Tesla, you get a little credit-card-sized device that acts as a key for the car. Of course, the automaker also offers a mobile app for locking and unlocking (you still need to open the doors with those hands of yours). However, Tesla appears to have removed mention of the key ...
titleSummary: Tesla Ditches Traditional Keys for High-Tech Ignition in Latest Vehicle Model
descriptionSummary: When you purchase a new Tesla, you receive a compact key card, but traditional keys and a mobile app for remote access are also provided. The card serves as an alternative entry method for added convenience.

title: Lancia’s Bold Revival Begins at Monte Carlo with World Premiere in 2026
description: Lancia is officially going global again, and it’s doing so in the most fitting way possible — with a rally car. The Italian brand has confirmed that its world debut will take place at the Monte Carlo Rally in January 2026, marking its first official return to international motorsport in over 30 ...
titleSummary: "Lancia Ignites a New Era with Globe-Trotting Debut at Monaco Rally"
descriptionSummary: Lancia is re-emerging on the global stage in a thrilling fashion - through a high-performance rally vehicle. Its long-awaited comeback will commence with a show-stopping debut at the prestigious Monte Carlo Rally in January 2026, ending a three-decade hiatus from international motorsport competition.

title: Ultra-Fast EV Charging Is Coming to the U.S. Next Year, But Do We Really Need It?
description: ChargePoint, one of the largest EV charging networks in the U.S., plans to roll out a new generation of 600-kilowatt chargers next year. These ultra-powerful units, built in partnership with Eaton, promise lightning-fast top-ups — theoretically enough to fully recharge a car in about 10 minutes. ...
titleSummary: "Electric Speed Ahead: Will America's Need for Lightning-Charge Roads Get Met?"
descriptionSummary: ChargePoint is set to debut a cutting-edge line of 600-kilowatt EV charging stations in 2024, developed alongside Eaton. These high-speed chargers are designed to provide rapid replenishment, potentially restoring a vehicle's battery to full capacity in under 15 minutes.
